review: I am so glad Amazon made this available. We were able to take our family room TV and turn it to a great resource for family movie night.  I would have given the rating the 5 stars but one glitch I have is getting to home screen to come up upon connection ... I have to hit the home button on the remote and would rather it just come up. This could be user error and it is not a big issue. Still an awesome accessory for our family room and we are going to get a 2nd for the bedroom. We are even cutting back on our mainstream Dish pkg. Being a Prime member is worth it in so many ways!
author: fbh
